title: Cap Crown, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap crown of Point d'Angleterre à Réseau with a central design of a vase surrounded by elaborate stylized floral and foliated forms.
